The Haval H2 offers exceptional value for money, it offers good quality, good practicality for a family, and gives a ride that many cannot fault. And, for further peace of mind.
The Haval H2 is one of the nation's most affordable SUVs, with the luxury model hitting hard on value It isn't only price in which the Haval H2 is competitive, however.The 1.5-litre turbocharged engine has 105kW and 230Nm on tap, making it capable of swift progress and a top speed of 190 km/h.
